page.title: 06Recreation in Banbury
page.content: In Banbury there is a big Sports Centre called Spiceball. You can do things like swimming, badminton, squash, archery, football and snooker. There is also a football club called Banbury United. Their ground is by the railway station. Also in Banbury there is an athletics club called Banbury Harriers. They train at Blessed George Napier School every Monday and Wednesday. There is a Banbury Comrades Boxing Club too. There are also some judo and karate clubs. Banbury Chestnuts is a bowls club by the Peoples' Park. There is also a BMX Club called Banbury Cross Ups, a football club called Banbury Athletic on Bretch Hill who train at Willy Freud, a cricket club called Banbury Twenties, a rugby club and lots of others.
